Resource.Name: CreatePartFlag
Resource.Description: Create runs, pathways as CATParts in order to be saved into Enovia

Resource.Name: MigrationMappingTable
Resource.Description: File (csv) with Mappings for V4 Classes and Attributes to V5

Resource.Name: TubingMigrationMappingTable
Resource.Description: File (csv) with Mappings for V4 Tubing Detail Names to V5 Data

Resource.Name: StructuresMigrationMappingTable
Resource.Description: File (csv) with Mappings for V4 Structures Names to V5

Resource.Name: StructuresMaterialMigrationMappingTable
Resource.Description: File (csv) with Mappings for V4 Structures Names to V5

Resource.Name: StructuresEndCutMigrationMappingTable
Resource.Description: File (csv) with Mappings for V4 Structures EndCut Names to V5

Resource.Name: MigratePiping
Resource.Description: Migrate Piping Data (true/false)

Resource.Name: MigrateEquipment
Resource.Description: Migrate Equipment Data (true/false)

Resource.Name: MigratePID
Resource.Description: Migrate Piping And Instrumentation Diagram Data (true/false)

Resource.Name: MigrateTubing
Resource.Description: Migrate Tubing Data (true/false)

Resource.Name: MigrateTubingToPiping
Resource.Description: Migrate Tubing Data to Piping Data (true/false)

Resource.Name: MigrateHVAC
Resource.Description: Migrate HVAC Data (true/false)

Resource.Name: MigrateStructures
Resource.Description: Migrate Structures Data (true/false)

Resource.Name: ImportPipingLine
Resource.Description: Import the V4 Pipeline Into V5 Piping Line Catalog (true/false)

Resource.Name: ImportICLoopLine
Resource.Description: Import the V4 ICLoopline Into V5 ICLoop Line Catalog (true/false)

Resource.Name: ImportTubingLine
Resource.Description: Import the V4 Tubing Line Into V5 Tubing Line Catalog (true/false)

Resource.Name: ImportHVACLine
Resource.Description: Import the V4 HVAC Line Into V5 HVAC Line Catalog (true/false)

Resource.Name: CreatePipingRunWithoutParts
Resource.Description: If 'true', create Piping runs without parts (true/false)

Resource.Name: CreateTubingRunWithoutParts
Resource.Description: If 'true', create Tubing runs without parts (true/false)

Resource.Name: CreateHVACRunWithoutParts
Resource.Description: If 'true', create HVAC runs without parts (true/false)

Resource.Name: MigratedPIDSheetSize
Resource.Description: Define the sheet size for migrated PID Drawings (Letter/Legal/A0 ISO/A1 ISO/A2 ISO/A3 ISO/A4 ISO/A ANSI/B ANSI/C ANSI/D ANSI/E ANSI/F ANSI)

Resource.Name: MigratedPIDNoShowSheetFormat
Resource.Description: No show sheet format (true/false)

Resource.Name: MigrateObjectWithMissingAttributes
Resource.Description: Migrate Objects even if some V4 attributes are not migrated (true/false)

Resource.Name: MigrateEquipmentWithMissingGeometry
Resource.Description: Migrate Equipment even if some geometry cannot be migrated (true/false)

Resource.Name: MigratePIDWithMissingLines
Resource.Description: Migrate PID Sheet even if some Lines cannot be migrated (true/false)
